MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH49 postcode area of Linlithgow.  We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.56am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of an underground cable fault on Manse Road and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible some via generator and  by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.01pm on Thursday 14th January 2021
